actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-490, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of H. Res. 423 with 1 hour of general debate. All points of order against consideration of and against the resolution and against the amendment are waived. A specified amendment is in order. One amendment is in order, offered by Mr. Michel and consisting of the text printed in the report of the Committee on Rules. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the resolution to final adoption without intervening motion except the specified amendment to be offered by Representative Michel of Illinois.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 121.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 257 - 159 (Roll no. 82).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 423) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for certain changes in the administrative operations of the House.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. Res. 423 (House rules and procedures).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 423) amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for certain changes in the administrative operations of the House.
